id.description: The unique identifier for the webhook

url.description: The url to listen to notifications (must be HTTPS)

enabled.description: Determines if the webhook should be active. If omitted, will be set to true by default

events.description: The events that should be published to the webhook. If omitted, all events will be subscribed by default. You can read about the supported events

token.description: The webhook token (read more about this in the “Webhook security” section
